translations: n．预感，预兆：对未来事件的不明确但强烈的感觉，通常是不祥的。

sentences.sentence: Premonitions of future undreamt-of happiness made her heart beat.
sentences.translation: 预感到未来从未有过的幸福，她的心怦怦直跳。

sentences.sentence: Dreams are often premonitions of things to come.
sentences.translation: 梦常常是未发生的事情的前兆。

sentences.sentence: Against my premonitions, I was duty-bound to reassure my old friend from Singapore.
sentences.translation: 尽管我有不祥的预感，但我有义务安抚我的新加坡老朋友。
